questions.question: This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's desperate battle at Marineford to save his brother Ace, leading to a war between the Marines and Whitebeard's pirates. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
